snippet: She announced on New Year's Eve that the concert was her last at the Bowery Ballroom.
abstract: She announced on New Year's Eve that the concert was her last at the Bowery Ballroom.
lead_paragraph: As 2011 recedes in the rear-view mirror and the weekend's confetti is swept away, we note as well the passing of another tradition. On New Year's Eve, Patti Smith announced from the stage at the Bowery Ballroom that the concert was her last - at the Bowery Ballroom.
